name: Dice's World
description:
a hobby game created by Diosnel Acosta(RandomDice)

1-6 to choose blocks.

Q to bring up hammer.

Space to jump.

E to bring up the block picker.

F to fly.

    -Shift to go down.

    -Space to go up.

    

Email me at dicesworldgame@gmail.com with screenshot!

Also very buggy
